statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(s:ElasticBeanStalkApplication) WHERE s.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH s LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (s)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ElasticBeanStalkApplication)-[:HAS_VERSION]->(n:ElasticBeanStalkVersion) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)

MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ElasticBeanStalkApplication)-[:HAS_ENVIRONMENT]->(n:ElasticBeanStalkEnvironment) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)

MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ElasticBeanStalkApplication)-[:HAS_VERSION]->(:ElasticBeanStalkVersion)-[r:HAS_SOURCE]->(:S3Bucket) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)

MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ElasticBeanStalkApplication)-[:HAS_ENVIRONMENT]->(:ElasticBeanStalkEnvironment)-[r:IS_RUNNING_VERSION]->(:ElasticBeanStalkVersion) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)

MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ElasticBeanStalkApplication)-[:HAS_ENVIRONMENT]->(:ElasticBeanStalkEnvironment)-[r:HAS_ENVIRONMENT_RESOURCE]->(:AutoScalingGroup) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)

MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ElasticBeanStalkApplication)-[:HAS_ENVIRONMENT]->(:ElasticBeanStalkEnvironment)-[r:HAS_ENVIRONMENT_RESOURCE]->(:LaunchConfiguration) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)

MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ElasticBeanStalkApplication)-[:HAS_ENVIRONMENT]->(:ElasticBeanStalkEnvironment)-[r:HAS_ENVIRONMENT_RESOURCE]->(:EC2Instance) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)

MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ElasticBeanStalkApplication)-[:HAS_ENVIRONMENT]->(:ElasticBeanStalkEnvironment)-[r:HAS_ENVIRONMENT_RESOURCE]->(:LaunchTemplate) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)

MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ElasticBeanStalkApplication)-[:HAS_ENVIRONMENT]->(:ElasticBeanStalkEnvironment)-[r:HAS_ENVIRONMENT_RESOURCE]->(:LoadBalancer) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
